name: LiquidFileUploader
description: Build task, for help you uploasd files to liquide file server
author: AviHadad
instanceNameFormat: Upload files from folder to LiquidFile

inputs.name: url
inputs.label: liquidfile server url
inputs.helpMarkDown: a full url to your liquidefile server

inputs.name: token
inputs.label: your token
inputs.helpMarkDown: a base64 token for your liquidefile server - use a secret

inputs.name: days
inputs.label: expire in days
inputs.helpMarkDown: a days number for your liquidefile server as expire gap

inputs.name: folder
inputs.label: folder to upload
inputs.helpMarkDown: the folder that contains the files to upload to your liquidefile server

inputs.name: private
inputs.label: permmision to download
inputs.helpMarkDown: appliese permmision dowload parameter to your liquidefile server

inputs.name: pool
inputs.label: pool name
inputs.helpMarkDown: pool id in liquidfile witch the files will be add to

inputs.name: emails
inputs.label: client emails
inputs.helpMarkDown: emails list witch the server send the download links to

inputs.name: auth
inputs.label: Auth to download
inputs.helpMarkDown: if he need to Authenticate befor downloading.
